title: Identify the Unknown
text: The formula is $$3x+4y=10$$, and we want to find $$y$$.
speech: The formula is  3 x plus 4 y is equal to 10 , and we want to find  y .

, and we want to find   y

title: Isolate
text: To isolate $$y$$, the first step is to subtract $$3x$$ from both sides to get $$4y=10-3x$$.
speech: To isolate  y , the first step is to subtract  3 x  from both sides to get  4 y is equal to, 10 minus 3 x .

from both sides to get   4 y is equal to, 10 minus 3 x

title: Isolate
text: Then, we can divide both sides of the equation by $$4$$ and get $$y=\frac{10-3x}{4}$$.
